name: Castaway VR
description: Castaway VR is an open-world sandbox survival game. You can mine, gather, cut, hunt, swim, craft, build, ride horseback, tame wolves, and do so much more. Castaway VR - Survive long enough to escape!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
